Author: gregmcgolf#5997
Content: I didn't bother with windows as it is a separate computer and I did a new computer with just ubantu/linux and am running the komodo and THC there. So I am only working with linux

Author: gregmcgolf#5997
Content: I downloaded the 0.5.0 git hub obsedian files and extracted them, but apparently don't know where to go from there

Author: gregmcgolf#5997
Content: am on the linux/ubantu computer where I have been running the THC cli wallet and daemon, pos64staker, etc

Author: gregmcgolf#5997
Content: I don't know what binary files are. It seems to me they were: sprout-proving.key sprout-verifying.key sapling-spend.params sapling-output.params sprout-groth16.params but I can't find them in the new github download?

Author: gregmcgolf#5997
Content: I remember when I first did this, that I had to manually put the komodod file into komodo/src. I also later put it into the pos64staker folder so I could use it for staking

Author: gregmcgolf#5997
Content: Has worked great for months

Author: gregmcgolf#5997
Content: komodod is not in the downloaded files 0.5.0 obsidian so I guess I could manually copy it over?

Author: gregmcgolf#5997
Content: It seems i also had to locate the sprout etc files and download them and put them into a folder, just don't remember

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: You no need to update sprout files, what you need to to is to change your current `~/komodo/src/komodod` file with `komodod` file from https://github.com/KomodoPlatform/komodo/releases/download/0.5.0/komodo_0.5.0_linux.tar.gz archieve and restart the `komodod` with THC params

Author: gregmcgolf#5997
Content: ok, what is thc params? is that the ac= line?

Author: gregmcgolf#5997
Content: ah, ok, and then after it syncs can I then do the pos64staker?

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: yes, just ensure that you see 0.5.0 version in getinfo

Author: gregmcgolf#5997
Content: Thx, appreciate your patience, will give it a go

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: No worries üëç

Author: gregmcgolf#5997
Content: should I replace all 3 of the files in komodo/src? fetch params, komodo-cli and the komodod

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: yes, you can replace all 3

Author: gregmcgolf#5997
Content: Those are the three that downloaded

Author: gregmcgolf#5997
Content: k, thx

Author: gregmcgolf#5997
Content: Awesome, get info is now 0.5.0, Thx so much. Now can I stop it and enter my daemon starting string for the pos64staker, or does that need to be modified

Author: gregmcgolf#5997
Content: it has my pubkey and blocknotify info

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: yep, for staking you can start it same way as you did before

Author: gregmcgolf#5997
Content: awesome

Author: Jobi#8901
Content: Is the new Verus Agama ver 6 ok to use for KMD, is it ready for the upgrade?

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: https://github.com/VerusCoin/Agama/releases/tag/v0.6.0-4 yes, in release description stated that: This release also includes support for Komodo's Platform upgrade on December 20th, at block height 1,670,000

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: So it should be fine after update

Author: Jobi#8901
Content: Thanks @TonyL

Author: looye29#2126
Content:
Hi,

I have downloaded Agama wallet on mine PC. I was able to create Veruscoin, DGB, Bitcoin and Ethereum.
When I try to add Tether Agama wallet says that there is already Ether wallet and nothing happens.

How can I get tether address if it won't create?

Also Agama wallet for Android is not installing and could also not be found on Google Play store.

Author: smk762#7640
Content: for mobile, Give atomicDEX a shot. Beyond being a DEX for trading, it also functions as a wallet. Verus is now maintaining Agama, so any issues they might be able to help in thier discord https://discord.gg/U5rWvpQ
